attributes.action: Always provide details of MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs lavish expenses should be known to the public at all times and subject to scrutiny by an independent audit. They must not be allowed to hide anything from the public, who pay their salary and expenses.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
